title: Analyze the extent of change in status of women

content.question: Explain the ways in which women’s participation in reform activities and in work outside the home changed between 1830 and 1870, and analyze the extent to which the changes affected the status of women in the United States.

frqParts.text: Explain the ways in which women’s participation in reform activities and in work outside the home changed between 1830 and 1870, and analyze the extent to which the changes affected the status of women in the United States.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
